__e: I told him, "You're not getting anything till you put a ring on my finger and a donkey in my father's barn!"
I remember my first time was out behind my uncle's barn with my second cousin.
So he put those boys out in the barn and the girls in the basement.
Then he cornered his wife in a stable and left for the mountains.
I think he's around that livery, and that's all I need to know.
